body.name: Smart Watch, 1.85" HD Samrt Watches for Women, Fitness Tracker Watch with Blood Pressure/Heart Rate/Sleep Monitor, Bluetooth 5.3 Smart Watch for Android/iOS Phones, IP68 Waterproof Sport Watch (Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 51 mins
features: 👑[Special Design-Magnetic Pink Bracelet] The 1.83" large UHD smart watch for women is equipped with a pink magnetic steel strap design, showing the unique charm of women through a fashionable bracelet-style strap. The strong and solid magnetic design ensures that the fitness watch is safe to wear, showing the elegance of the bowl at all times . Comes with pink and purple silicone straps, which are light and skin-friendly, easy to wear, and stress-free during exercise and sleep.

👑[Born for Women’s Health] The heart rate smartwatch has built-in optimized sensors that can better and more accurately monitor health data 24 hours a day. The blood pressure watch can not only monitor heart rate, blood pressure and sleep status, but also adds a female health reminder function: tracking menstrual cycle, safe period, ovulation period and pregnancy period, giving women more comprehensive care and care.

👑[Activity Tracker and Smart Watch] The fitness tracker watch supports more than 110 sports modes, and you can choose the corresponding sports mode according to your sports habits. Fitness watch for women can record steps, distance, calories burned, etc. during exercise. Better track exercise effects and improve exercise efficiency. At the same time, it monitors changes in heart rate during exercise, which is the best assistant for safe exercise.

👑[Communicate By Your Wrist] The smart watch for android phones has a built-in optimized microphone and fidelity speaker, and uses Bluetooth 5.3 technology for fast and stable connection, making it easy to answer/make calls quickly. The android smart watch supports the synchronization function of up to 100 frequently used contacts. The smart watch for iphone compatible also supports SMS, email, WhatsApp, Ins, Facebook and other APP message push, creating a true era of wrist communication.

👑[Reject High Frequency Charging] The watch uses a 300mAh large-capacity battery to bring you an uninterrupted smart life experience. Daily use can last up to about 7 days without daily charging. The standby time is up to 30 days, so you don’t have to worry about battery problems caused by long periods of inactivity. Comes with a special charging cable, which is not easy to fall off when charging.

👑[IP68 Waterproof & After-sale Service] The waterproof smart watch reaches IP68 rating. For daily use, there is no need to take off the watch when washing your face and hands, making your use process simpler and more convenient. Smart watches have many functions. If you encounter any problems during use, we have professional after-sales service personnel to help you 24 hours a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was exactly what I was looking for! I can make and receive phone calls without being near my phone. I get all of my text, FB messenger and email notifications. I also love how I can customize the display screen to any of my own pictures. (Image is a little blurry, but that was my phone, not the watch!) Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewText: This watch info is very accurate even the blood pressure readings are within two to three numbers from the cuff measurement. And the battery life is amazing I’m on day four without a charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the features and the magnet band!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing battery life
reviews.reviewText: I had a Samsung watch for almost 2 years, paid $10 a month for the ability to get and receive calls and had to charge it at least once a day sometimes more because of the battery. When the battery finally died, (I could sit and watch the percentage go down), I ordered this watch. I didn't expect much since it was so much less expensive than the Samsung. I was pleasantly surprised when it came, the looks and options were really good. Then I found out I could still make or get phone calls on the watch which was again incredible, without paying $10 a month for the benefit. And then the battery. After the first charge it lasted six full days. Since then it hasn't been quite that good but it's at least 4 days. After coming from a watch that had to be charged twice a day in order to get through the night I am thrilled. Definitely worth a purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this watch. I love the many things it keeps track of for me and I love the look of it! It also comes with three different bands, which is so so nice! I would definitly buy this watch again, and I would recommend it to others!
Me ha encantado, bonito, con 2 correas, tiene un montón de actividades y pantallas, muy fácil de enlazar con el teléfono. Estoy sorprendida calidad - precio le doy un 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my daughter and she loved it, does everything she wanted and absolute bargain. Very stylish additional straps too.

The media could not be loaded. Me ne serviva una da un po’! È leggermente grande sul mio polso, ma è abbordabile e poi normale perché ha uno schermo più visibile!Molto raffinato, ha anche due cinturini! Si carica velocemente, per collegarlo basta Bluetooth e funziona anche con iOS.C’è un app da scaricare gratis con cui ti aiuta a configurarlo, in più hai la possibilità di cambiare sfondo e tipo del menu.Il suono è chiaro, riceve bene.

L'AKUMAKA Smartwatch è un prodotto di alta qualità che offre un eccellente rapporto qualità-prezzo.Il design è moderno ed elegante, si adatta a qualsiasi occasione e i materiali sono di alta qualità. Il cinturino è comodo da indossare anche per lunghi periodi.L'AKUMAKA Smartwatch offre una vasta gamma di funzionalità, tra cui monitoraggio del battito cardiaco, tracciamento dell'attività fisica, notifiche smartphone e molte altre. Il monitoraggio è preciso e consente di tenere traccia dei progressi nel fitness in modo accurato.L'autonomia della batteria è impressionante, può durare diversi giorni con un uso moderato.L'interfaccia e l'usabilità sono molto intuitive. L'app complementare è semplice da utilizzare e offre ulteriori dettagli sulle attività e sulla salute.L'AKUMAKA Smartwatch è un prodotto affidabile, funzionale e alla moda. È consigliato per chiunque stia cercando uno smartwatch di alta qualità.In conclusione:L'AKUMAKA Smartwatch è un prodotto affidabile, funzionale e alla moda. È consigliato per chiunque stia cercando uno smartwatch di alta qualità. Inoltre, è importante sottolineare che all'interno dello scatolo sono presenti altri 2 cinturini intercambiabili, che consentono di personalizzare l'aspetto dello smartwatch in base alle proprie esigenze o preferenze

J'ai choisi cette montre car je la trouve très féminine et élégante grâce à son bracelet en acier noir et au tour du cadran couleur or. Si vous préférez un bracelet en silicone, un autre bracelet noir est fourni dans la boîte. J'adore son grand écran avec ses couleurs très lumineuses. Son fonctionnement est très intuitif et il n'y a pas besoin de lire la notice pour savoir s'en servir rapidement. Il y a un très grand nombres de choix de cadrans ce qui permet de le changer régulièrement. Elle est très complète au niveau de ses fonctionnalités, il y en a énormément ( sport, fréquence cardiaque, sommeil, prise d'appel, consultation des messages... etc) Tout y est pour répondre aux besoins qu'une montre connectée doit avoir.
